    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112676</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112676</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">In the Classroom - Word Knowledge 3</string>
            <string language="en">In the Classroom - Word Knowledge 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im Klassenzimmer - Wort-Wissen 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la salle de classe - la connaissance 3 de 
mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na sala de aula - conhecimento 3 da palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nell'aula - conoscenza 3 di parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στην τάξη - γνώση 3 του Word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En la sala de clase - conocimiento 3 de la 
palabra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">By using the words in a context in this drag’n’drop exercise, you can check if you have really understood the words in the previous exercises, In the Classroom - Word Knowledge 1 and 2.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">By using the words in a context in this drag'n'drop exercise, you can check if you have really understood the words in the previous exercises, In the Classroom - Word Knowledge 1 and 2. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners -- Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">school</string>
            <string language="sv">education</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">school</string>
            <string language="en">education</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Indem Sie die Wörter in einem Kontext in dieser 
drag'n'drop Übung verwenden, können Sie, ob Sie wirklich die Wörter
in den vorhergehenden Übungen verstanden haben, in das Klassenzimmer 
überprüfen - fassen Sie Wissen 1 und 2 ab. Safir - Englisch 
und Berufsleben für Anfänger -- Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant les mots dans un contexte dans cet 
exercice de drag'n'drop, vous pouvez contrôler si vous avez vraiment 
compris les mots dans les exercices précédents, dans la salle de 
classe - exprimez la connaissance 1 et 2. Safir - l'anglais et 
vie active pour des débutants -- module 6 - que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando as palavras em um contexto neste 
exercício do drag'n'drop, você pode verificar se você compreender 
realmente as palavras nos exercícios precedentes, na sala de aula - 
exprima o conhecimento 1 e 2. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos -- módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando le parole in un contesto in questa 
esercitazione del drag'n'drop, potete controllare se realmente avete 
capito le parole nelle esercitazioni precedenti, nell'aula - esprima 
le conoscenze 1 e 2. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti -- modulo 6 - che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με τη χρησιμοποίηση των λέξεων σε συμφραζόμενα σε 
αυτήν την άσκηση drag'n'drop, εσείς μπορεί να ελέγξει εάν 
έχετε καταλάβει πραγματικά τις λέξεις στις προηγούμενες 
ασκήσεις, στην τάξη - γνώση 1 και 2. αγγλική και οικονομικά 
ενεργή ζωή Safir του Word - για τους αρχαρίους -- ενότητα 6 
- τι θα θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usando las palabras en un contexto en este 
ejercicio del drag'n'drop, usted puede controlar si usted realmente ha
entendido las palabras en los ejercicios anteriores, en la sala de 
clase - redacte el conocimiento 1 y 2. ¿Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes -- módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene gusto?</string>
          </description>
